*Teltoli giggles, then gets serious again* "Alright! What do I do, Tissa? Can I call you Tissa? Whole lot easier!"

------Original Message------
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 18, 2000 10:29:02 PM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


"okay, i suppose...." Plintissa said.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "Teltoli SilverFlight" <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 6:22 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> -Teltoli-
>
> Teltoli shakes her head in half amusement. She didn't have anything to do,
so she wondered if she could help Plintissa build her Base? She wouldn't
join her group, she would just help. If felt good to help others.
>
> On impulse, she looked back to the spot that the bot had been hiding in.
She narrows her eyes.. there was a big thing of blue! She turns back and
ignores it.
>
> "Plintissa, can I help you build your Base? It'd be fun!" *She grins*
